g.G1056: Galilæa (i.e. the heathen circle), a region of Palestine
g.G1179: the ten-city region; the Decapolis, a district in Syria
g.G2414: Hierosolyma (i.e. Jerushalaim), the capitol of Palestine
g.G2449: the Judæan land (i.e. Judæa), a region of Palestine
g.G4008: through (as adverb or preposition), i.e. across
g.G2446: the Jordanes (i.e. Jarden), a river of Palestine
